languages.text: "Если же ты ищешь замену Владайму, то я назову тебе имя — Октавиана. Мои шпионы выяснили, что после суда над Токара именно она возглавила Касбаллику на Футфоле. Пока я позволяю ей проворачивать свои гнусные делишки — Касбаллика обещала щедро заплатить нужными нам ресурсами и покориться закону, если я прекращу репрессии. Глупцы... Я лишь дарую им короткую отсрочку перед неизбежным судом".

"If you are looking for Tocara's replacement, let me give you a name: Octaviana. My spies have discovered that, after his trial, she became the head representative of the Kasballica on Footfall. For now, I allow her to conduct her unscrupulous dealings — the Kasballica has promised to pay us generously with resources we need and fall in line if I halt the repressions. Those fools... I am only granting them a short respite before the inevitable trial."
languages.original_text: "Если же ты ищешь замену Владайму, то я назову тебе имя — Октавиана. Мои шпионы выяснили, что после суда над Токара именно она возглавила Касбаллику на Футфоле. Пока я позволяю ей проворачивать свои гнусные делишки — Касбаллика обещала щедро заплатить нужными нам ресурсами и покориться закону, если я прекращу репрессии. Глупцы... Я лишь дарую им короткую отсрочку перед неизбежным судом".

languages.text: “如果你打算找人替代托卡拉，我可以给你个名字——奥克塔维娜。我的探子发现，托卡拉接受审判之后，奥克塔维娜就成了卡斯巴利卡在落脚港的首席代表。卡斯巴利卡已经承诺，说只要我不再对他们施压，他们就愿意慷慨地赠予我们需要的资源，凡事支持我们。那群蠢货……我仅仅是让他们稍微喘息一下罢了，但不可避免的审判终将到来。”
languages.original_text: "If you are looking for Tocara's replacement, let me give you a name: Octaviana. My spies have discovered that, after his trial, she became the head representative of the Kasballica on Footfall. For now, I allow her to conduct her unscrupulous dealings — the Kasballica has promised to pay us generously with resources we need and fall in line if I halt the repressions. Those fools... I am only granting them a short respite before the inevitable trial."

traits.locale_text: “如果你打算找人替代托卡拉，我可以给你个名字——奥克塔维娜。我的毯子发现，托卡拉接受审判之后，奥克塔维娜就成了卡斯巴利卡在落脚港的首席代表。卡斯巴利卡已经承诺，说只要我不再对他们施压，他们就愿意慷慨地赠予我们需要的资源，凡事支持我们。那群蠢货……我仅仅是让他们稍微喘息一下罢了，但不可避免的审判终将到来。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「トカラの代わりを探しているなら、一人候補者がいる。オクタヴィアナだ。スパイの情報によると、トカラの裁判が終わった後、フットフォールのカスバリカの代表になった者だそうだ。今のところ、彼女の不謹慎な取引を許している。カスバリカは私たちに必要な資源を惜しみなく支払うと、そして私が止めれば協力すると約束していたからな。愚か共めが…あいつらには裁判が始まる前の、短い休息を与えているだけだ」
languages.original_text: "If you are looking for Tocara's replacement, let me give you a name: Octaviana. My spies have discovered that, after his trial, she became the head representative of the Kasballica on Footfall. For now, I allow her to conduct her unscrupulous dealings — the Kasballica has promised to pay us generously with resources we need and fall in line if I halt the repressions. Those fools... I am only granting them a short respite before the inevitable trial."

traits.locale_text: 「トカラの代わりを探しているなら、一人候補者がいる。オクタヴィアナだ。スパイの情報によると、トカラの裁判が終わった後、フットフォールのカスバリカの代表になった者だそうだ。今のところ、彼女の不謹慎な取引を許している。カスバリカは私たちに必要な資源を惜しみなく支払うと、そして私が止めれば協力すると約束していたからな。愚か共めが…あいつらには裁判が始まる前の、短い休息を与えているだけだ」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «Si busca al sustituto de Tocara, déjeme decirle que su nombre es Octaviana. Mis espías han descubierto que, tras su juicio, ella se convirtió en la principal representante de la Kasballica en Paso. De momento le permito llevar a cabo sus tratos sin escrúpulos, ya que la Kasballica ha prometido pagarnos generosamente con los recursos que necesitemos y alinearse si detengo las represiones. Menudos necios... Solo estoy concediéndoles un breve respiro antes del juicio que está por llegar».
languages.original_text: "If you are looking for Tocara's replacement, let me give you a name: Octaviana. My spies have discovered that, after his trial, she became the head representative of the Kasballica on Footfall. For now, I allow her to conduct her unscrupulous dealings — the Kasballica has promised to pay us generously with resources we need and fall in line if I halt the repressions. Those fools... I am only granting them a short respite before the inevitable trial."

traits.locale_text: «Si busca al sustituto de Tocara, déjeme decirle que su nombre es Octaviana. Mis espías han descubierto que, tras su juicio, ella se convirtió en la principal representante de la Kasballica en Paso. De momento le permito llevar a cabo sus tratos sin escrúpulos, ya que la Kasballica ha prometido pagarnos generosamente con los recursos que necesitemos y alinearse si detengo las represiones. Menudos necios... Solo estoy concediéndoles un breve respiro antes del juicio que está por llegar».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr Tocaras Nachfolger sucht, nenne ich Euch einen Namen: Octaviana. Meine Spione haben herausgefunden, dass sie nach seinem Prozess zur Vertreterin der Kasballica auf Footfall geworden ist. Ich gestattet ihr vorerst, ihre skrupellosen Geschäfte zu führen. Die Kasballica hat versprochen, uns großzügig mit dringend benötigten Ressourcen zu bezahlen und sich zu benehmen, wenn ich die Repressalien beende. Diese Narren ... Ich gewähre ihnen nur eine kurze Verschnaufpause vor dem unvermeidlichen Prozess."
languages.original_text: "If you are looking for Tocara's replacement, let me give you a name: Octaviana. My spies have discovered that, after his trial, she became the head representative of the Kasballica on Footfall. For now, I allow her to conduct her unscrupulous dealings — the Kasballica has promised to pay us generously with resources we need and fall in line if I halt the repressions. Those fools... I am only granting them a short respite before the inevitable trial."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr Tocaras Nachfolger sucht, nenne ich Euch einen Namen: Octaviana. Meine Spione haben herausgefunden, dass sie nach seinem Prozess zur Vertreterin der Kasballica auf Footfall geworden ist. Ich gestattet ihr vorerst, ihre skrupellosen Geschäfte zu führen. Die Kasballica hat versprochen, uns großzügig mit dringend benötigten Ressourcen zu bezahlen und sich zu benehmen, wenn ich die Repressalien beende. Diese Narren ... Ich gewähre ihnen nur eine kurze Verschnaufpause vor dem unvermeidlichen Prozess."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « Si vous cherchez un remplaçant à Tocara, je vous recommande Octaviana. Après le procès de l'ex-suzerain, mes espions ont découvert qu'elle était devenue la représentante principale de la Kasballica à Castel. Pour l'heure, je l'autorise à mener ses affaires clandestines, car la Kasballica a promis de nous payer généreusement en ressources dont nous avons besoin et de bien se tenir si j'arrête tout acte de répression. Les imbéciles... Je ne leur accorde qu'un court répit avant de les convoquer devant ce tribunal. »
languages.original_text: "If you are looking for Tocara's replacement, let me give you a name: Octaviana. My spies have discovered that, after his trial, she became the head representative of the Kasballica on Footfall. For now, I allow her to conduct her unscrupulous dealings — the Kasballica has promised to pay us generously with resources we need and fall in line if I halt the repressions. Those fools... I am only granting them a short respite before the inevitable trial."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous cherchez un remplaçant à Tocara, je vous recommande Octaviana. Après le procès de l'ex-suzerain, mes espions ont découvert qu'elle était devenue la représentante principale de la Kasballica à Castel. Pour l'heure, je l'autorise à mener ses affaires clandestines, car la Kasballica a promis de nous payer généreusement en ressources dont nous avons besoin et de bien se tenir si j'arrête tout acte de répression. Les imbéciles... Je ne leur accorde qu'un court répit avant de les convoquer devant ce tribunal. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Tocara'nın yerini alanı arıyorsan sana ismini vereyim: Octaviana. Ajanlarım, Tocara'nın mahkemesi sonrasında Binliman'daki Kasballica'nın baş temsilcisinin o olduğunu keşfetti. Ahlaksızca çalışmalarını devam ettirmesine şimdilik göz yumuyorum. Kasballica, onlara uygulayacağım baskıyı durdurmam karşılığında ihtiyacımız olan kaynakları cömertçe paylaşacağının ve hizaya gireceğinin sözünü verdi. Sersemler. Kaçınılmaz yargılanmaları öncesinde onlara kısa bir soluklanma anı bahşediyorum."
languages.original_text: "If you are looking for Tocara's replacement, let me give you a name: Octaviana. My spies have discovered that, after his trial, she became the head representative of the Kasballica on Footfall. For now, I allow her to conduct her unscrupulous dealings — the Kasballica has promised to pay us generously with resources we need and fall in line if I halt the repressions. Those fools... I am only granting them a short respite before the inevitable trial."

traits.locale_text: "Tocara'nın yerini kimin aldığına bakıyorsan, sana direkt isim vereyim: Octaviana. Ajanlarım, Tocara'nın mahkemesi sonrasında Binliman'daki Kasballica'nın baş temsilcisinin o olduğunu keşfetti. Ahlaksızca çalışmalarını devam ettirmesine şimdilik göz yumuyorum. Kasballica, onlara uygulayacağım baskılamayı durdurmam durumunda ihtiyacımız olan kaynaklarını cömertçe paylaşacağının ve hizaya gireceğinin sözünü verdi. Sersemler. Kaçınılmaz yargılanmaları öncesinde onlara yalnızca kısa bir soluklanma anı bahşediyorum."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
